Name: Trap Adventure
About the game: 'Trap dungeon' is a game about a boy who got into a mysterious dungeon and is trying to get out of it. All the catacombs are filled with strange devices that can open the way. But the approaches to them are guarded by dangerous enemies and deadly traps. Can you get to the last level and escape to freedom? Game Features: Old-schoold gameplay Many dangerous traps Nice pixel art Steam Achievements support Family friendly
